definitions.definition: One of the simple machines ; a sheave , a wheel with a grooved rim , in which a pulled rope or chain lifts an object (more useful when two or more pulleys are used together, as in a block and tackle arrangement, such that a small force moving through a greater distance can exert a larger force through a smaller distance).

main_definition: ( engineering , countable ) One of the simple machines ; a sheave , a wheel with a grooved rim , in which a pulled rope or chain lifts an object (more useful when two or more pulleys are used together, as in a block and tackle arrangement, such that a small force moving through a greater distance can exert a larger force through a smaller distance).
